name: Find all SPs with Azure permissions on Management Groups
Find all SPs with Azure permissions on Subscriptions
Find all SPs with Azure permissions on Resource Groups
Find all SPs with Azure permissions on individual resources

queryList.query: MATCH (az) WHERE (az:AZVM or az:AZAutomationAccount or az:AZContainerRegistry or az:AZFunctionApp or az:AZLogicApp or az:AZManagedCluster or az:AZVMScaleSet or az:AZWebApp or az:AZKeyVault) MATCH p = (sp:AZServicePrincipal {serviceprincipaltype: 'Application'})-[r]->(az) RETURN p
